sect2.title: Moving of utf8_encode and utf8_decode
sect2.para: The utf8_encode and utf8_decode functions have now been moved to the standard extension as string functions, whereas before the XML extension was required for them to be available.

sect2.title: Removal of sql.safe_mode ini setting
sect2.para: The sql.safe_mode ini setting has now been removed.

sect2.title: Default value of realpath_cache_size ini setting changed
sect2.para: The default value of the realpath_cache_size ini setting has changed from 16 kilobytes to 4 megabytes.

sect2.title: LMDB support
sect2.para: The DBA extension now has support for LMDB.

sect2.title: Changes to the PHP build system

listitem.simpara: Unix: Autoconf 2.64 or greater is now required to build PHP.
The --with-pdo-oci configure argument no longer needs the version number of the Oracle Instant Client.
Removed --enable-gd-native-ttf configure argument. This was not used since PHP 5.5.0.
imageantialias is now also available if compiled with a system libgd.
imagegd stores truecolor images as real truecolor images. Formerly, they have been converted to palette.

sect2.title: Moving MCrypt to PECL
sect2.para: The MCrypt extension has now been moved out of the core to PECL. Given the mcrypt library has not seen any updates since 2007, its usage is highly discouraged. Instead, either the OpenSSL or Sodium extension should be used.

sect2.title: gettype and closed resources
sect2.para: Closed resources, are now reported as explicitly closed when using the gettype function, previously these would be returned as 'unknown'.
